  SERVICES NOTICES
Langdale Life Extension - February 10 to May 31, 2025

Updated: Wednesday, April 23, 2025

Berth 2 Life Extension
Langdale (Sunshine Coast) Terminal
February 10 to May 31, 2025

As part of our ongoing commitment to ensure the safe operation of our terminal facilities, we started carrying out marine construction activities to Berth 2 at the Langdale terminal. The project began on February 10 and is expected to continue until May 31.

Construction is planned Monday to Saturday, 7:00 am to 5:00 pm. A minor portion of the work must be completed during low tides outside regular working hours. Noise levels around the terminal may be more noticeable than normal, and our teams will work to minimize the impact for both our customers and neighbours.

We do not expect any impacts to terminal operations and will continue to update this Service Notice should there be any changes to this scheduled project.

Thank you to our customers and neighbours for your patience and understanding as we complete this required work.

For up-to-date sailing and departure information, check Current Conditions, follow @BCFerries on X or phone 1-888-223-3779 for further assistance.

Horseshoe Bay Transfer Deck Life Extension Project - November 2024 to May 2025

Reposted: Sunday, December 29, 2024

Horseshoe Bay Terminal (Vancouver) 
Transfer Deck Life Extension
November 25 to May 2025

As part of our ongoing commitment to ensure the safe operation of our terminal facilities, necessary work to extend the life of the transfer deck at Horseshoe Bay terminal began Monday, November 25 and is expected to be completed May 2025.

To ensure timely completion and to minimize impacts to service, night work will be required and is expected to take place Monday through Friday, excluding statutory holidays, between 9:00 pm and 5:00 am.

Construction activities, including concrete chipping and patching, will take place and noise levels around the terminal may be more noticeable than normal. Our teams will work to minimize the impact for both our customers and neighbours.

This Service Notice will be updated should there be any changes to this scheduled work.

We thank our customers and neighbours for their patience and understanding as we complete this necessary project.

For up-to-date sailing and departure information, check Current Conditions, follow @BCFerries on X or phone 1-888-223-3779 for further assistance.

Terminal info & parking

Vancouver (Horseshoe Bay)

# 6750 Keith Rd , West Vancouver, V7W 2V1

Terminal info & parking
Get directions
Parking: 60% available

Parking at Vancouver (Horseshoe Bay)

 

Parking at Horseshoe Bay terminal is independently operated and managed by Impark.

Capacity: 598 spaces 
Short term: 138
Long term: 460

Payment options: Visa, Mastercard and American Express.

  • Meters - Pay by License Plate Number in Long Term and Pay by License Plate Number in Short Term
  • PayByPhone App- Pay by License Plate Number in Long Term and Pay by License Plate Number in Short Term
  • hangTag App- Pay by License Plate Number in Long Term and Short Term

Parking info and rates: Meters require exact change or credit card payment.

Short term lot – Licence Plate Number is required to purchase parking. No need to display ticket on dash.

Lot codes/names and parking operations:
Meter - 1621 (Pay by Licence Plate)
PayByPhone - 1621 (Pay by Licence Plate)
hangTag - HSB Long & Short Term offers Scan to Pay & Text to Pay (Pay by Licence Plate)


Rates:

  • $1.00 for 15 minutes, maximum 2 hours
  • $4.00 for 1 hour
  • $30.00 for each 24 hour period 
  • Multiple day parking allowed

Long term lot – License Plate Number is required to purchase parking. No need to display ticket on dash.

Lot codes/names and parking operations:
Meter - 1621 (Pay by License Plate Number)
PayByPhone - 1748 (Pay by License Plate Number)
hangTag - HSB Long Term (Pay by License Plate)

Rates:

  • $14.00 for 6 hours
  • $25.00 for each 24 hours
  • $12.50 each additional 12 hour period after the first 24 hours
  • Monthly passes available. Contact Impark for availability and rates.

Note:

  • If paying by credit card on meter, enter your mobile phone number to receive a text notifying you that your parking is about to expire. You can then follow the text instructions (reply within 5 mins of receiving the text) to extend your parking up to 24 hours.
  • You can also pay or extend (start new parking session) your parking without signing up for the PayByPhone app. Visit PayByPhone.com, continue as a guest and follow the instructions (a new parking session will start). Your stall number will be required for long term parking and licence plate number for short term parking.
  • Cash acceptance

Meters accept coins only - no change given.
One meter accepts bills/coins and is located in long term lot. For long term parking only.

Parking is not permitted in the aisles. Vehicles will be ticketed and/or towed.


Parking host:
Parking host is available occasionally (7 days/week from 7am - 9pm) for assistance at 778-838-9272.


Towing:
Mitchell's Towing
604-982-0115
